title: Amazon Prime subscription to become 16% more expensive in the US
content:
It seems that Netflix is not the only company raising prices for its online services in 2022. During Amazon’s reporting of its Q4 2021 fiscal results, the company revealed that it will soon increase Amazon Prime subscription prices in the US.

more…

The post Amazon Prime subscription to become 16% more expensive in the US appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Amazon has confirmed that it will increase Amazon Prime subscription prices for US customers in a few weeks.
